INSERT INTO MVY_MOVIE VALUE(MOVIE_NO, GENRE_NO, GENRE_NAME, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_PRDTYEAR, MOVIE_NATION, MOVIE_DIRECTOR, MOVIE_RUNTIME, MOVIE_GRADE, MOVIE_PRICE, MOVIE_REGISTRANT, MOVIE_CREDATE, MOVIE_STORY) VALUES(#{movieNo}, #{genreNo}, #{genreName}, #{movieTitle}, #{prdtYear}, #{nation}, #{director}, #{runtime} , #{grade}, #{price}, #{registrant}, SYSDATE, #{movieStory})

INSERT INTO MVY_MOVIE_PHOTO (IDX, PARENT_SEQ, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CRE_DATE) VALUES (MVY_MOVIE_PHOTO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{parentSeq}, #{original_file_name}, #{stored_file_name}, #{file_size}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT MV.MOVIE_NO, MV.GENRE_NO, MV.MOVIE_TITLE, MV.MOVIE_DIRECTOR, MV.MOVIE_CREDATE, MV.GENRE_NAME, MV.MOVIE_REGISTRANT FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, M.MOVIE_NO, M.GENRE_NO, M.MOVIE_TITLE , M.MOVIE_DIRECTOR, M.MOVIE_CREDATE, M.GENRE_NAME, M.MOVIE_REGISTRANT FROM ( SELECT MOVIE_NO, GENRE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_DIRECTOR, MOVIE_CREDATE, GENRE_NAME, MOVIE_REGISTRANT FROM MVY_MOVIE
ORDER BY MOVIE_NO ASC) M ) MV WHERE MV.RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT MOVIE_NO, GENRE_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_PRDTYEAR, MOVIE_NATION , MOVIE_DIRECTOR, MOVIE_RUNTIME, MOVIE_GRADE, MOVIE_PRICE, MOVIE_CREDATE, GENRE_NAME, MOVIE_STORY FROM MVY_MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_NO = #{movieNo} ORDER BY MOVIE_NO ASC

SELECT PARENT_SEQ, B.MOVIE_NO, IDX, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, B.MOVIE_TITLE, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024, 1) AS FILE_SIZE FROM MVY_MOVIE_PHOTO A, MVY_MOVIE B WHERE B.MOVIE_NO = A.PARENT_SEQ AND PARENT_SEQ = #{movieNo} ORDER BY PARENT_SEQ ASC

SELECT MOVIE_NO FROM MVY_MOVIE
ORDER BY MOVIE_NO ASC
